creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: garden scene: large garden pond in foreground with island and trees; water features reflection of garden in back and middle ground; garden has green landscape, pavilions, trees, shrubs, blooming trees, and silhouettes of trees; three white birds in pond LLC

title: Garden in Okayama
